Key Features:

  • Available in multiple seat configurations to fit any space
  • Quality construction and comfortable cushioning
  • Attractive contemporary design to elevate your decor
  • Variety of durable upholstery fabric options
  • 1 year warranty included for peace of mind

Why Choose FurnitureZone?

At FurnitureZone, we aim to exceed customer expectations. Our sofas are built to last using high-grade materials and craftsmanship. We stand behind our products with a 1 year warranty, and will work to promptly resolve any issues that may arise. Our team makes sure you get the ideal sofa for your needs at the best price. Discover the FurnitureZone difference today!

excerpt.rendered:
Classic lines and contemporary design make the Avenue Greene Rana Loveseat a timeless piece for living rooms and seating areas. This small spaces sofa set design is the perfect blend of form and function with ergonomic seating and generous padding. The sinuous spring foundation and pocket cushions combine to offer ideal comfort with no compromise to style.
